title: 301. What Would Be the Best Universal Language? (Earth 2.0 Series)
description: We explore votes for English, Indonesian, and … Esperanto! The search for a common language goes back millennia, but so much still gets lost in translation. Will technology finally solve that?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
